Name: Raspberry Frangipane Spritz
Instructions: STIR 5 ingredients (without ice) and strain into ice-filled glass, already charged with prosecco. TOP with soda.
Review: Just like the eponymously named dessert, this slightly sweet spritz is flavoured with raspberry, almond, vanilla and coconut. Butterscotch liqueur adds a biscuity note.
History: Created in 2013 by yours truly for Jamie's Italian Bars. Spritz history and other Spritz cocktails
Nutrition: One serving of Raspberry Frangipane Spritz contains 180 calories
